Title: The Thief of Paris
Writer: Georges Darien (novel), Jean-Claude Carrière (screenplay), Louis Malle (screenplay), Daniel Boulanger (dialogue)
Actors: Jean-Paul Belmondo, Geneviève Bujold, Marie Dubois, Julien Guiomar
Plot: In Paris around 1900, Georges Randal is brought up by his wealthy uncle, who steals his inheritance. Georges hopes to marry his cousin Charlotte, but his uncle arranges for her to marry a rich neighbour. As an act of revenge, Georges steals the fiance's family jewels, and enjoys the experience so much that he embarks upon a life-time of burglary.
Production: Nouvelles Éditions de Films [fr], Production Artistes Associés
